_header: The King of Kings reigning over all
Title(s): ‘Balade…au tres noble Roy H[enry] le V’
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘Balade…au tres noble Roy H[enry] le V’ — a virelai of five 8-line stanzas, with the same rhyme throughout

HunHM111.First Lines:
The Kyng of Kynges regnyng ouer alWhich stablisshid hath in
                    eternitee…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…Byseechyng vn to god þat to his payYee may gouerne your
                    hy dignitee
HunHM111.Attributed Title:
Ceste balade ensuante feust faite au tres noble Roy Henri le
                            Vt que dieu pardoint le iour que les seigneurs de son Roialme
                        lui firent lour homages a Kenyngton (f. 26)
